content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

You are given a markdown-formatted text `md`. Write a function `q_and_a_extractor` to extract all text in the markdown sections Question and Answer (starting with `# Question` and `# Answer`, respectively) and return the answer in a tuple like `(question,answer)`. Strip any leading spaces and newlines from the extracted text.

```julia
function q_and_a_extractor(md::AbstractString)
    questions = []
    answers = []

    # Get all lines that start with '# Question' or '# Answer'
    for line in split(md, "\n")
        if occursin("# Question", line)
            push!(questions, strip(line))
            while !occursin("# Answer", line) && !isempty(line)
                line = next_non_blank_line(md, start(line))
                if isempty(line)
                    break
                end
                push!(questions, strip(line))
            end
        elseif occursin("# Answer", line)
            push!(answers, strip(line))
            while !occursin("# Question", line) && !isempty(line)
                line = next_non_blank_line(md, start(line))
                if isempty(line)
                    break
                end
                push!(answers, strip(line))
            end
        end
    end

    # Ensure we have a question and an answer
    if length(questions) == 0 || length(answers) == 0
        return nothing
    end

    return (join(questions, "\n"), join(answers, "\n"))
end

function next_non_blank_line(md::AbstractString, start::Int)
    i = findnext(x -> x != ' ' && x != '\t', md, start) do c
        return Char(c)
    end
    return isnothing(i) ? "" : substr(md, i, md[end])
end
```

To use the function:

```julia
julia> md = """
       # Question
       What is the meaning of life?
       
       # Answer
       The meaning of life is to find your own path and create a meaningful existence for yourself and others.
